title-group.article-title: Announcement of the first Nordic Evaluation Conference

body.p: The national evaluation associations of Denmark, Norway, Sweden and Finland have announced the first Nordic Evaluation Conference. The conference will take place in Aalborg, Denmark, on 13–15 June 2012.

The aim of the conference is to strengthen the Nordic evaluation tradition and to encourage interaction and cooperation among evaluation researchers and practitioners in the Nordic countries. Thus, the aim is to establish professional networks that will develop and strengthen the field of evaluation and the knowledge of evaluation as a phenomenon.
The conference is organized around eight workshops with participants’ paper presentations and, in order to attend the conference, participants are to submit a paper for one of the workshops.
The conference is supported by the Danish Evaluation Association. Please see http://www.nek.aau.dk/ for more information.
